item.title: InameVR
item.author: Jorge Vega
item.description: Custom DIY VR Project Currently under the search of a stable version. InameVR is an unespecific library that makes programming a homebrew driver for a customized “DIY” device easier. InameVR uses as the main graphical UI and C++ for the server backend. Cardboardvr (image) Code can be downloaded HERE
